name: Playground Pirate
description:
This is a pirate simulator; In this game you take the role of a kid with an intense amount of imagination. He is on his mission to pillage and plunder while knocking out every landlubber on his way to the treasure.

The game is played with the following keys:
A+D : Horizontal movement
W : Jump
SPACE : Attack

Submission for GBJAM4.

Tested on Windows and web.
